video.title: Worst Cooks in America Collection
video.synopsis: America's worst cooks square off for the chance to win $25,000 as they develop their skills in the kitchen with help from culinary mentors.

episodes.synopsis: Sixteen of the worst cooks in America arrive at base camp and attempt to "impress" Anne Burrell and Bobby Flay with their own signature dishes.
episodes.title: Baseline Challenge

episodes.synopsis: The recruits are tested on an international level as they attempt to learn to make hand-pulled Chinese noodles and meatballs from around the globe.
episodes.title: International Cuisine

episodes.synopsis: It's all about flavors for the recruits as they prepare their own pizza and have their palettes tested with extreme and odd flavor combinations.
episodes.title: Flavor Combos

episodes.synopsis: The remaining recruits learn how to make a late-night treat at a local diner, then Anne and Bobby teach them an exquisite romantic entrée for two.
episodes.title: Late Night/Date Night

episodes.synopsis: The recruits get a St. Patrick's Day surprise when they learn they have to cater a party for 40 hungry Irish New Yorkers.
episodes.title: Luck of the Irish

episodes.synopsis: The recruits visit a fish market and have to make a colossal raw bar tower, then face a daunting challenge: cooking for Anne and Bobby's families.
episodes.title: Something Fishy

episodes.synopsis: The recruits face their toughest critics yet: feeding 30 screaming third graders. Then they must cook a family-style meal for their loved ones.
episodes.title: Kicked Off by Kin Folk

episodes.synopsis: Two recruits battle it out for the $25,000 prize. Their final challenge is to cook a full restaurant-style dinner for three of America's best chefs.
episodes.title: The Final Battle

episodes.synopsis: Chefs Anne Burrell and Bobby Flay find 14 of the worst cooks in America to compete in a culinary boot camp.
episodes.title: The Worst of the Worst

episodes.synopsis: The remaining 12 recruits hit the high seas in a fishing skill drill and have to take a huge step into the world of farm-to-table butchery.
episodes.title: Straight-Edge Skills

episodes.synopsis: Chefs Anne Burrell and Bobby Flay train the remaining 10 recruits' palates as they work on creating their own unique flavor combinations.
episodes.title: Fire and Ice

episodes.synopsis: The remaining eight recruits race a delivery boy in making their own homemade Chinese takeout, then test their baking skills.
episodes.title: Do-It-Yourself Cooking

episodes.synopsis: The remaining six recruits head to the grocery store to make samples for the shoppers, then host a party for some large, scary bikers.
episodes.title: Facing Fears of Feeding Others

episodes.synopsis: The final four recruits are in for a surprise as they get to cook for some very special guests: their loved ones.
episodes.title: Revisiting the Past

episodes.synopsis: Chefs Anne Burrell and Bobby Flay go head-to-head in the finale. Anne is ready to fight for her crown, but Bobby wants redemption.
episodes.title: So Close I Can Almost Taste It

episodes.synopsis: Coming off a loss to Bobby Flay, Anne Burrell rounds up 14 of America's worst cooks, picks teams and gives the recruits their first cooking lesson.
episodes.title: Worse Than Ever

episodes.synopsis: The lessons for the week involve learning to cook from scratch, including a hands-on experience sourcing milk for homemade cheese.
episodes.title: Scratching the Surface

episodes.synopsis: From sweet doughnuts to savory roulades, the recruits are asked to experiment for the first time and create their own dishes.
episodes.title: Glazed and Confused

episodes.synopsis: This week's challenges teach the contestants how to churn out large quantities of food, from rapidly rolling sushi to catering a party.
episodes.title: Surprise

episodes.synopsis: The recruits wake up to surprise houseguests: Bobby Flay and Anne Burrell, craving the most important meal of the day.
episodes.title: Two-a-Day

episodes.synopsis: In order to make it to the finale, the remaining recruits will be cooking for the loved ones who nominated them for boot camp.
episodes.title: Eat, Pray, Love

episodes.synopsis: The two final recruits cook a three-course meal in a professional restaurant kitchen for a panel of culinary experts.
episodes.title: Timer's Up
